optionDescriptions.Get notified if a new exercise has been: Get notified when a (new) exercise has been created or started
optionDescriptions.Get notified if an exercise has been ope: Get notified when an exercise has been opened for practice (e.g. Quiz)
optionDescriptions.Get notified if a new post about an exer: Get notified when a new post about an exercise has been created
optionDescriptions.Get notified if a new reply about an exe: Get notified when a new reply about an exercise has been created
optionDescriptions.Receive a notification when an attachmen: Receive a notification when an attachment was changed
optionDescriptions.Get notified when a new post about an ex: Get notified when a new post about an exercise has been created
optionDescriptions.Get notified when a new reply about an e: Get notified when a new reply about an exercise has been created
optionDescriptions.Receive a notification when the process: Receive a notification when the process of archiving a course or exam has been started
